channel.title: CVE Feed for GZTimeWalker -- GZCTF
channel.description: The latest CVEs for GZTimeWalker -- GZCTF

item.title: CVE-2024-34699|2024-05-13T19:01:19.774Z -- GZTimeWalker -- GZCTF
item.description: GZ::CTF is a capture the flag platform. Prior to 0.20.1, unprivileged user can perform cross-site scripting attacks on other users by constructing malicious team names. This problem has been fixed in `v0.20.1`.
